Title: [Dashboard][Customer KM Metrics]Verify that User can load Top Customers by Total KM Bar Chart successfully
Description: Test case to verify that the Customer KM Metrics widget displays a bar chart showing top 5 customers by total KM
Precondition: 1. User is logged into the system; 2. User has access to dashboard; 3. Customer KM Metrics widget is available
Steps: 1. Navigate to dashboard; 2. Locate Customer KM Metrics widget; 3. Click on widget to expand; 4. Wait for chart to load; 5. Verify chart displays top 5 customers; 6. Check chart data accuracy; 7. Confirm chart responsiveness
Expected Result: 1. Dashboard loads successfully; 2. Customer KM Metrics widget is visible; 3. Widget expands to show detailed view; 4. Chart loads within acceptable time; 5. Top 5 customers by total KM are displayed; 6. Chart data matches expected values; 7. Chart responds to user interactions
Test Data: Environment: Test environment; Login: testuser; Password: testpass; Expected: Top 5 customers displayed in bar chart format

Title: [Dashboard][Customer KM Metrics]Verify that User can view Vehicle Type KM Chart when no customer selected successfully
Description: Test case to verify that Vehicle Type KM chart displays appropriate message when no customer is selected
Precondition: 1. User is logged into the system; 2. User has access to dashboard; 3. Customer KM Metrics widget is available
Steps: 1. Navigate to dashboard; 2. Locate Customer KM Metrics widget; 3. Ensure no customer bars are selected; 4. Look at right-side chart area; 5. Verify chart displays empty state; 6. Check for instructional message; 7. Confirm message clarity
Expected Result: 1. Dashboard loads successfully; 2. Customer KM Metrics widget is visible; 3. No customer selection is active; 4. Right-side chart area is visible; 5. Chart shows empty state correctly; 6. Message "Please select a customer to view the vehicle type wise KMs" is displayed; 7. Message is clear and informative
Test Data: Environment: Test environment; Login: testuser; Password: testpass; Expected: Empty state message displayed when no customer selected
